name: Siberian Secrets
description:
Siberian Secrets is an early in-development project of a Top-Down Stealth based game, on a snowy complex thematic, that has the player sneaking through a map avoiding hazards to complete an objective without getting seen!

Current features: Enemy Patrol and detection. Controller Support. Tilemap art.

The project is very bare bones and early in the development and missing a lot of key features, more updates soon to come.

CURRENT VERSION ONLY SUPPORTS GAMEPAD CONTROLS!

M&KB support is soon to come as well.

More features coming soon:

  • Fully fledged maps
  • Gamemodes (starting with Item Retrieval, more coming later)
  • Improved enemy AI
  • Friendly NPC's and dialog systems
  • Skills, Items and new & reworked mechanics
